text: Ben and I are getting a divorce.

and you're doing your best to flame out of a third?

How does that make you feel?

and he was in a hurry.

I mean, I do that stuff all the time.
Why? Are you worried about him?

but Bert does have a family history of dementia.

spontaneously stop by, have a little chat?

but the last couple of days, he's hardly had anything.

I'll be back to check on you soon.
It's not there. It's not there.
We're at the hospital. They're gonna take care of you.

for her to pass the remains on her own.

Do you know if she's allergic to any?
but we're gonna take good care of her.

I believe that is, indeed, the case.

Why do I have to have an operation?

that would put you at risk of an infection in the belly,

laparoscopic surgery done with a camera
what we call a Band-Aid surgery.
A laparoscopic appendectomy is the best course of action.

so I think I'll stick around, if you don't mind.

I recommend we try to induce instead of a D&E.

so doctors were afraid to do the D&E.
Where we live, that could happen.

and then pull it up and out.

though I'm not quite sure why.

We have no more information on the guy?
matching his description, and no one's come looking for him.

how he is just very concerned about her.

is that even a real person?

You say that he's living at the rehab center.
but I'm pretty sure he's clean. We talk a lot.
He's really been working the program.
with his heart might have something to do

I'll do what I can, but you need to understand,

when it's 6 to 1 odds, that would get me...

which is like an allergic reaction.

till I get your blood work back?

we both agreed that there was nothing there.
